name: Flappy Bird (itch) (MarkCookieMonster)
description: Hi! i made a 2d flappy bird game using unity . you might have already played it through your web browser, but now its available for download for mobile since my other website does'nt support mobile .you need to install the apk .click here to play the game online in your browser https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ. Have fun!
